blog.name: letsrevieweverything
blog.title: Reviews of movies, shows, music, and books
blog.description: A blog for reviews, critciques, and anasisys of media. Featuring:-reviews of Marvel movies and other movie franchises. -Recaps and analyses of currently airing cartoon. -critiques of pop songs and ads. -and other disscusions of reality.

title: Detective Pikachu (2019)
body:
Detective Pikachu feels like it came out in the 90s. Maybe that’s because Ryan Reynolds is the only blockbuster movie star here, allowing the rest of the cast to inhabit their roles in peace. Maybe it’s the fact that it’s run-time is short and snappy, causing the stakes of the movie to feel lighter as a result. Maybe it’s the charmingly awkward writing, not laugh out loud funny but lighthearted enough to be entertaining instead of cringe-inducing. Or maybe it’s just the fact that it’s not a mega-crossover, so we actually get to spend some time with our main character. We get to see enough of Justice Smith’s Tim and the titular Pikachu that we can feel for them during the sad scenes, and we feel just sad enough to be happy when things work out better in the end.

 The mystery feels vaguely predictable and the steps to find the clues feel more like a series of wacky barely-related events, but we’re in the Pokemon world so we get to enjoy lots of funny and scary monsters along the ride.

 This movie rewards hardcore fans with references to the anime and games, but every Pokemon-specific thing is given a brief explanation so the unenlightened don’t feel locked out. Still, some parts might feel a bit out of left field to people with no knowledge of what these monsters can do, and a couple of weird moments might even shock super-fans. 

But maybe that’s just another reason this movie feels like a throwback to the days when fantasy movies drew you into their own bizarre little worlds. Possibly the best video game movie of all time just because the bar is so low; Detective Pikachu is a strange little movie with a big heart, just like the electric mouse himself. 6/8.

blog.name: thenerdsofcolor
blog.title: The Nerds of Color
blog.description:
We are a community of fans who love superheroes, sci-fi, fantasy and video games but are not afraid to look at nerd/geek fandom with a culturally critical eye.
visit us at http://www.thenerdsofcolor.org

summary: Hard NOC Life: 'Detective Pikachu' Writer Dan Hernandez
title: Hard NOC Life: 'Detective Pikachu' Writer Dan Hernandez
body:
#DetectivePikachu writer Dan Hernandez (@cubanmissledh) dives deep on adapting franchises, being a #NOC and fan in Hollywood, creating #ODAAT, and the misunderstood genius of #1600Penn

This week on Hard NOC Life, Keith is joined by Dan Hernandez, one-half of the screenwriting duo behind Pokémon: Detective Pikachu.

http://traffic.libsyn.com/thenerdsofcolor/HNL147.mp3

summary: Can you make some Tim Goodman icons and headers?
question: Can you make some Tim Goodman icons and headers?
answer:
I have zero graphic skills. I would totally make them if I could but alas I suck. I know this from personal experience that I suck. It was an art travesty.

There is some Pikachu ones and the person sometimes takes requests and probably would make you some
https://elshopper.tumblr.com/post/184944503507/i-have-no-clue-if-youre-taking-requests-but-i-saw

For anyone that makes graphics would you be able to help this Pokepal out?

summary: “They’re outside!” Sat down and watched everything back to back and we noticed this little Easter egg.  At EXACTLY 1:39 in both...
caption:
“They’re outside!”

Sat down and watched everything back to back and we noticed this little Easter egg.  At EXACTLY 1:39 in both Mewtwo strikes back and Detective Pikachu mewtwo says the same line.  “They’re outside”  different contexts but bravo guys for such a tiny little call back.

reblog.comment:

summary: I keep seeing all these super cute Detective Pikachu posts but last night I had a dream that I was in the party store and I...
body: I keep seeing all these super cute Detective Pikachu posts but last night I had a dream that I was in the party store and I found like a total gremlin Pikachu poppin balloons. Like imagine a little chihuahua rat opossum hybrid Pikachu that shoots lightning that somehow attached itself to me but he was wild and a lil aggressive and just looked ugly as fuck I loved him so much

blog.name: ckret2
blog.title: It's pronounced "secret two"
blog.description:
You can also call me Puff. I'm also ckret2 on FF.net (and the MSPA forums, and PokéCommunity, and everywhere else...) I write fanfics, and I'm also behind approximately two million (on hiatus) roleplay blogs, most now abandoned. If you came here because of those things, feel free to send me an ask! Makes me feel warm and gooey.

This is my general blog for socializing, answering questions about my fics and/or headcanons and/or anything else, and collecting writing resources.

If I haven't been on here in a while, feel free to poke me over on my roleplay blogs. My currently active blog is: verdigrisprowl (Transformers IDW Prowl).

icon by @cyanideinsomnia
